name: TicTacToe - An Addictive Game
description:
The classic Tic Tac Toe, wonderfully designed for the screen on your iPhone, iPod, or iPad. Specifically with children in mind.
This is the simplest version of Tic Tac Toe available for preschoolers, and is designed with the intent of having them play along with a peer or adult to guide them.

Tic Tac Toe is a fun, fast, and intuitive game that you can play with your friends or family anytime, anywhere.
Who will be the first to get three in a row? Good luck!

Enjoy and feel free to rate us in the AppStore!
